attributes.action: Extend the M54 Motorway from Telford to Aberystwyth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To Extend the M54 from Telford, via the Shrewsbury by-pass, to eventually finish on the West Wales coast at the City of Aberystwyth.  Also in doing so, the creation of a ring road at Newtown, Powys.
